newsitem.headline: Prime Members
newsitem.text: Exclusive Renovate Performance Settings coming soon for donators

newsitem.headline: Welcome to RenoCon
newsitem.text: RenoCon is Renovate Rom's new information, mod, tweaks, contact, and performance center. Enjoy!

newsitem.headline: Portal
newsitem.text: Renovate Portal will come back online when and if Community Members submit mods and we have enough to support the application itself

newsitem.headline: Renovate Portal
newsitem.text: Portal for Renovate Rom has been temporarily taken down. Reasons for it as follows: We do not have enough custom content for it, Themes now managed by HTC Theme Manager, Current Mods are not supported by current build, not enough maintainers.
